snippet: The River Mountains Trail is a 35-mile ribbon that circumscribes the River Mountains, connecting Boulder City, Henderson and the wilderness between.
abstract: River Mountains Trail is a 35-mile ribbon outside Las Vegas that circumscribes the River Mountains, connecting Boulder City, Henderson and the wilderness between, offering a challenging stretch for bike riders.
lead_paragraph: The River Mountains Trail is a 35-mile ribbon that circumscribes the River Mountains, connecting Boulder City, Henderson and the wilderness between.

headline.seo: Outside Las Vegas, the River Mountains Trail Makes a Scenic Ring
headline.main: Outside Las Vegas, an Ace of a Bike Trail
headline.print_headline: Outside Las Vegas, an Ace of a Bike Trail
